name: Nail Art Designs
short_description: Various methods are adopted to the different nail art designs such as painting objects and drawings with the tip of the fine brush and mix colors on your nail with the help of toothpicks. With the method for the first time use the toothpick to apply a point and it applies a different color with another toothpick. So, 2 colors melt to create the special effect nail. In addition to the application, stickers, gems and stones, you can also use this method for water marbling where you can add a drop of paint on the surface of the water to create a marble effect. http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZCOSus4cXN8
